name: Mahmoud Ismail Ali Mahmoud
skills_sentences: digital transformation including Internet of Things and Artificial Intelligence
market research and industry trends analysis
technology industry and digital solution expertise
responsibility_sentences: built and maintained relationships with key clients and generated sales within a business to business environment

converted prospects into clients through diligent follow-ups and closing strategies
created and delivered customer presentations resulting in 40 percent increase in closing deals
developed and implemented effective sales strategies to drive revenue growth achieving 300 percent of target
managed and developed sales and marketing strategies resulting in 15 percent revenue increase
managed complex negotiations with senior-level executives resulting in 5 percent growth
prepared regular sales reports including sales performance, revenue projections, and pipeline analysis
researched and identified qualified prospects within the target market
